comment: Notifications are a bit weird. When I'm outside of the app, I'll get comments and replies that show up in my notification bar. But when I click them, it won't bring me to the comment, it'll just bring me to my Pinterest homepage. I can look through my notifications in the app, but not all comments show up. This happens EVERY time, I've never been able to see what people reply to me.
scenarios: Receiving comments and replies in the notification bar, but clicking them only redirects to the Pinterest homepage instead of the specific comment.
Not all comments are visible when checking notifications within the app.
key sentence: Not all comments are visible when checking notifications within the app.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Create', 'description': 'Tab for creating something'}, {'name': 'Notifications', 'description': 'Tab for viewing notifications'}, {'name': 'Saved', 'description': 'Tab for viewing saved items'}, {'name': 'Avatar: Jane', 'description': 'Display the avatar for the user Jane'}, {'name': 'Access Search Page', 'description': 'Access the search page.'}, {'name': 'Browse content', 'description': 'Browse recommended pins.'}]
